dict.acceptation: 弹药库；杂志；弹仓；胶卷盒；

sent.orig: William Milin, a missionary magazine, explaining the thought of magazine-running in Chinese Monthly Magazine.
sent.trans: 基督教传教士威廉·米怜撰写的《察世俗每月统记传·序》，对《察世俗每月统记传》的办报思想作了阐释。

sent.orig: Fortune magazine is America's second longest running business magazine after Forbes magazine.
sent.trans: 财富杂志是继福布斯杂志以来美国第二悠久的商业杂志。

sent.orig: Fortune magazine is an American business magazine founded by Henry Luce in 1930.
sent.trans: 《财富》杂志由美国人亨利·鲁斯创办于1930年，是世界上较有影响力的商业杂志之一。

sent.orig: If you have worked a magazine before, then send a sample that magazine.
sent.trans: 如果曾有杂志设计经验，请提供一份杂志样本。

sent.orig: He was the subject of several magazine profiles, being voted Time magazine's Man of the Year.
sent.trans: 他成为好几家杂志人物简介栏的主题，《时代》杂志选他为本年度风云人物。
